Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Assembly to pass, and the Governor to sign A.5336A and S.639, legislation authorizing banks to refuse payment of moneys when there is reason to believe that a vulnerable adult is being financially exploited.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorizing banks to refuse payment of moneys when there is reason to believe that a vulnerable adult is being financially exploited. (A.5336A/S.639)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign legislation requiring the mandatory reporting of suspected elder abuse.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the mandatory reporting of suspected elder abuse.
